channel.title: Blogs on Patrick King
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Patrick King

item.title: New Website!
item.description: After many years of owning www.patrickcking.com and really doing nothing with it, I’ve decided that it’s time to make use of this domain. This decision comes as a time when I am preparing to leave all social media websites and I am trying to find the least disruptive way to do so. The main drive to build this site is for my contact and event pages which I hope will allow me to keep in touch with my friends and continue to organize parties.
